introduction: 在海洋中漂浮了 50 年后，塑料垃圾形成了一个巨大的垃圾带。 《垃圾岛》的背景设定在环境问题“大太平洋垃圾带（GPGP）”中。 在垃圾岛上，不同的角色会不顾自己的意愿偶然发现彼此。 他们每个人都在这个绝望的岛上面临着悲惨的结局。After 50 years of floating in the ocean, plastic waste formed a huge garbage patch. The background of is set in the "Great Pacific Garbage Patch(GPGP)" which is an environmental problem. On the Trash island, various characters stumble across each other regardless of their will. They each face a tragic ending on this hopeless island. 35
